mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.discription AS "discription", a.status AS "status", a.create_id AS "createId.id", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateId.id", a.update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_property_info( id, name, discription, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{discription}, #{status}, #{createId.id}, #{createTime}, #{uVersion}, #{updateId.id}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_property_info SET name = #{name}, discription = #{discription}, create_time = #{createTime}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateId.id}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
